subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yankees catcher Russell Martin broke a 2-2 tie with a towering home run in the ninth inning, sparking a late rally as the Yankees beat the Orioles in Game 1 of an A.L. division series.
snippet: Yankees catcher Russell Martin broke a 2-2 tie with a towering home run in the ninth inning, sparking a late rally as the Yankees beat the Orioles in Game 1 of an A.L. division series.
